name: Monster Track
description:
Top-down zombie shooter created as a development exercise in pathfinding and delta time.

Controls:

  • Left-click to shoot
  • Right-click to spawn zombies
  • Scroll-wheel to switch weapons
  • F1 to show path-finding grid

Credits:

  • Survivor sprite reused from opengameart.org CC BY 3.0
  • Spaceship sprite reused from opengameart.org CC BY-SA 3.0
